ActorTalk: Amazing! I lost fair and square! You're truly a respectable opponent. I'll keep training. Someday I'll surpass you!
I never go back on my word, so since I promised to go with you, that's exactly what I'll do.
With this, all malfunctioning Kuroro units have been retrieved. Time to notify the area supervisor.
Thank you very much for your assistance, Gray Raven Commandant. We truly appreciate your hard work.
The issue with these Kuroro units isn't too serious. They're mainly acting on their own and out of control because they're missing their behavior constraint modules.
We'll install and calibrate these modules for them. The Kuroro units will be operating normally soon.
The repair process is quite fast. I'm sure you'll see them active on the streets very soon.
If there's nothing else, I'll take them back now. Thank you again for your assistance.
By the way, what's going to happen to these Kuroro units?
